title: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test
description: Identifies risky and harmful alcohol use

questions.text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
How many drinks do you have on a typical day when drinking?
How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
How often during the last year have you found you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
How often during the last year have you failed to do what was expected because of drinking?
How often during the last year have you needed a drink in the morning to get going?
How often during the last year have you had guilt or remorse after drinking?
How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before?
Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?
labels: Yes, but not in the last year

questions.text: Has a relative, friend, or doctor suggested you cut down on drinking?
labels: Yes, but not in the last year
